name: Lovely Studio Apartment at East Pier
neighborhood_overview: The property is  less than a mile from the North End, Old North Church, Quincy Market, and Faneuil Hall.
description:
This brand new studio boasts some of the nicest amenities in the city. Comes with full kitchen, in unit laundry, WiFi and cable.
Dogs and cats allowed. Breed and weight restrictions may apply. A one-time, non-refundable pet fee of $300 is required per pet.

The space
Lovely view of East Boston on the waterfront. The apartment is fully furnished including a full kitchen, furniture, housewares, linens, towels, WIFI, cable, phone service, and Washer/Dryer in the apartment. This is a studio apartment and does have 1 queen sized bed and 1 double sleeper sofa but it is less than 600 sq ft so keep this in mind when booking if you will have 3-4 people staying.

Guest access
The amenities located on the ground floor are all shared spaces: game room with billiards, lounge area with TV and fireplace.

Other things to note
Please note that this is an apartment community and the building is not affiliated with your reservation.
